trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter that retrieves a list of control IDs in the current container.
The UpdateProgressAssociatedUpdatePanelIDConverter class derives from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.StringConverter> class.
It provides a list of control IDs to be displayed in a property-editing control in design-time environments.
For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Generalized Type Conversion](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressAssociatedUpdatePanelIDConverter"></xref> class.
Returns a collection of control IDs from the container inside the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> object for the specified format context.
A context that can be used for more information about the environment that this converter is invoked from.
This parameter and its properties can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
A collection of strings that represent the control IDs of the controls in the current container.
If no controls are currently in the container, the method returns an empty collection.
If the context is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or if there is no current container, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

Returns a value that indicates whether the collection of standard values that is returned from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressAssociatedUpdatePanelIDConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exclusive list of possible values for the specified context.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressAssociatedUpdatePanelIDConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exclusive list of possible values; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if other values are possible.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether this converter supports a set of control ID values that can be selected from a list.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressAssociatedUpdatePanelIDConverter.GetStandardValues*> should be called to find a common set of control ID values the object supports; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
